channel.title: Make your own plasma!
channel.description:
Disclaimer- I am not in anyway responsible for any damage to you, your property, or anyone else due to attempting this stunt. It is dangerous and should not be done without proper fire safety guild lines in place. Also, this experiment could potentially destroy your microwave so don't attempt this if you need your microwave.
Ever wanted to make the rare 4th state of matter? Well now you can. This can be done with simple items everybody has laying around the house. Items needed-1.Toothpick 2. Lighter 3. Small piece of modeling clay or another microwave safe supportive substance 4. Microwave
First, place the toothpick into the piece of modeling clay so that it can be set down with the toothpick sticking straight up. Next, place the toothpick and clay structure into the microwave. Then, light the top of the toothpick and shut the microwave. And lastly, set the microwave for one minute and enjoy your own personal display of plasma balls shooting everywhere.
Scientists do not know what the cause of this natural phenomenon is. Some people also say that the plasma balls could also be considered a rare form of lightning known as ball lightning.
You can also substitute a candle if for some reason you feel the need to place more expensive items in your microwave as demonstrated here. [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=rk4SZfnRufo]http://youtube.com/watch?v=rk4SZfnRufo[/url]
Added note- that is not me in the video Note 2- If there are any unclear parts of this tutorial or other errors, I will go ahead and blame it on the flu. I've been out of school for a week now and am still running a 104 fever. So I blame any mistakes on that.

item.title: Make your own plasma!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Also, the ‘plasma’ balls give off some sort of Nitric oxide, or something like that, which is pretty toxic. Make sure your in a well ventilated room, and you don’t breath any in.

Read full topic

item.title: Make your own plasma!
item.dc:creator: @aps aps
item.description:
@aps wrote:

No you know whats really kick ass. Microwaving tin foil. Kinda cool, but not as cool as PLASMA. Just shape the foil to looke like a coil, or anything you want to try. I did it with 2 peices of foil.

Bent like this
W

And put another one right beside it, this one being straight.

Microwave for around 1:30, and watch as blue,green,red,orange,purple,yellow and other colors SPARK in front of your face.

WARNING
Do not microwave for extended periods of time, and do not repeat this every 10 minutes. Your microwave will explode. In your face. I’ve seen somone do it too. Ow.

Read full topic

item.title: Make your own plasma!
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Also, if you put a jar upside down over the toothpick (and leave some space under the jar for oxygen), the plasma will go to the top (bottom) of the jar and stay there for a few seconds.

Read full topic
